column3: yesi nkrum na ɔhyɛ hɛn do: nnyɛ dɛ yɛpɛ dɛ wɔpa hɛn ho tam bi a

column3: na yenyim dɛ yɛtse fie wɔ nyimpadua no mu yi

"Na otwar dɛ wɔdze hɛn pue Kraest atsɛmbu egua no enyim hɔ
column3: ama obiara eenya dza ɔayɛ no nyimpadua yi mu no

column4: na hom eenya biribi ebua hɔn a wɔhyehyɛ hɔnho enyiwado

column4: na sɛ hɛn enyi da hɔ a

column4: sɛ ɔbaako wui maa hɔn nyina

column3: na mbom wɔaatsena ase ama nyia osiaan hɔn ntsi owui na ɔsoɛɛr bio no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ofir ndɛ yennyim obiara wɔ honam afamu
column3: na sɛ yeehu Kraest wɔ honam afamu mpo a

column2: "Dɛm ntsi sɛ obi wɔ Kraest mu a
column3: ɔyɛ abɔdze fofor: ndzɛmba adadaw no etwa mu

column2: "Na iyi nyina fir Nyankopɔn a ɔnam Kraest do aka hɛn nye nankasa noho abɔ mu
column3: na ɔdze nkabɔmu som dwumadzi no ama hɛn no;"

column2: "ɔno nye dɛ Nyankopɔn nam Kraest mu kaa wiadze nye nankasa bɔɔ mu
column3: na oemmbu hɔn mfom enngu hɔn do
column4: na ɔdze nkabɔmu som ho dwumadzi no ahyɛ hɛn nsa."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi yɛyɛ ananmusifo ma Kraest

column4: Hom nye Nyankopɔn nka mbɔ mu."
